title: The Incident on the Bridge
description: The last anyone saw of Thisbe Locke, she was standing by a car on the side of the bridge.She’d been depressed since she stopped seeing Clay, who humiliated her in front of everyone at his party. But would Thisbe really jump because of that?Her sister swears she wouldn’t.The police know that grief-stricken families always hope for a different ending. And that decisions about jumping can be made in an instant.Either way, there’s no sign of Thisbe.
author: Laura McNeal
